meanings.sent1: She redoubles her efforts to finish the project on time.

meanings.sent3: The student redoubles his study time after failing the first test.
meanings.sent4: His laughter redoubles the joy in the room.
meanings.sent5: The applause redoubles as the performer takes a bow.

meanings.sent3: The baker redoubles the amount of frosting on the cake by mistake.
meanings.sent4: Her smile redoubles the beauty of her face.
meanings.sent5: The storm redoubles in strength, causing more damage.
